system.sustained:
On successful Focus Power Test, the Weirdboy hits target with bolt of energy doing 1d10 + Psy Rating Energgy Damage with Shocking Quality. For each Degree of Success, the bolt affects another target within 3 metres of the original for half the damage of the original attack. This bolt can be dodged as with other ranged attacks.
Shocking: If Target takes any damage from attack, makes +0 Toughness Test, on failiure Target is stunned for a number of rounds equal to half the damage suffered. +10 to save per AP.
